title: 2 Cannabis Stock Picks
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Julian Lin, founder of Cannabis Growth Investor, returns to discuss two of his favorite cannabis plays - a REIT and an MSO. Cannabis investing philosophy (valuations should drive capital allocations). Net leases, cap rates and how legislation may affect bullish thesis. Smart acquisitions, management compensation, inside ownership and understanding high debt.
